About Me

Introduction

Hello!

My name is Dawid Sadowski and I am 20 years old. I am a second-year Business Management with Innovation and Technology student at the University of Salford, passionate about combining business insights with technological innovation.

Hobbies & Interests

I am a passionate supporter of Manchester United. I regularly attend matches and follow the team's progress in various competitions.
